Thank you to @sustainableag, @NFUDC, @FarmVetCo, @YoungFarmers and @LSPnow for your advocacy on behalf of young and #beginningfarmers, and for your support for the #BFROA! Together, we can ensure the next #FarmBill is truly a #NextGenFarmBill!https://twitter.com/reptimwalz/status/928375641489231884 …
https://twitter.com/i/moments/928378334228156417 …
Through the #BeginningFarmer and Rancher Opportunity Act of 2017, we can ensure the next #FarmBill is truly a Farm Bill for the next generation! #BFROA

The #BFROA would:

Expand #beginningfarmers’ access to affordable land
Empower new farmers w skills to succeed in today’s ag economy
Ensure equitable access to financial capital & federal crop insurance
Encourage commitment to conservation & stewardship across generations
By promoting access to land, making credit readily available, and funding world class research and education programs, the #BeginningFarmer and Rancher Opportunity Act works to do just that. #BFROA
To accomplish this goal, we must provide young Americans with the training and tools they need to take up and keep up farms of their own. #BeginningFarmers #BFROA
It is among our top priorities as a nation to ensure our next generation of #farmers is able to provide the U.S. and the world with a safe, abundant food supply. #BeginningFarmers #BFROA

Today, I'm pleased to introduce the #BeginningFarmer & Rancher Opportunity Act of 2017 (#BFROA) w/ @JeffFortenberry. This bipartisan bill would help support the next generation of U.S. farmers by building upon the gains of the 2014 #FarmBill. Learn more:https://walz.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/walz-introduces-bill-to-support-next-generation-of-farmers …

#ReasonsWeNeedaFarmBill: to give certainty and peace of mind to everyone

#ReasonsWeNeedaFarmBill: to provide funding for critical research being done at America's land grant universities, including the U of M
#ReasonsWeNeedaFarmBill: to provide food-aide to hardworking folks struggling to get by
#ReasonsWeNeedaFarmBill: to ensure our beginning farmers have the training and tools they need to feed, clothe, and fuel the world
#ReasonsWeNeedaFarmBill: The First District ranks 2nd in MN in total Ag products sold, and 1st in livestock
#ReasonsWeNeedaFarmBill: two of the top five MN counties in Ag production are in the First District
#ReasonsWeNeedaFarmBill: Most recent farm census data counted over 32,000 farm operators in the First District of MN
#ReasonsWeNeedaFarmBill: MN crops were worth $18.5 billion in cash receipts & $6.8 billion in exports in 2011 alone
